0: rm -rf /tmp/* && echo '/exit' | mlc_llm chat HF://mlc-ai/$(MODEL) || true; rm -rf /tmp/*
rm -rf /tmp/* && echo '/exit' | mlc_llm chat HF://mlc-ai/$(MODEL) || true; rm -rf /tmp/*

1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
type: kubernetes.io/service-account-token
metadata:
  name: {{ include "headlamp.fullname" . }}-admin-token
